#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#define getchar getchar_unlocked

int fast_integer()
{
    int set = 0, minus = 1;
    char c = getchar();
    while(c < '0' || c >'9') 
	{
		if(c=='-')
		minus = -1;
		c = getchar();
	}
    while(c>='0' && c<='9')
    {
    	set = (set<<3) + (set<<1)+c-'0';
    	c = getchar();
    }
    return minus*set;
}
int main()
{
//	freopen("in.txt", "r", stdin);
	int *mat[100], i, j, N, M, field = 1;
	char str[100];
	while(1)
	{
		N = fast_integer(); M = fast_integer();
		if(N == 0 && M == 0)
			break;
		for(i = 0; i < N; i++)
			mat[i] = (int*)calloc(M, sizeof(int));
		for(i = 0; i < N; i++)
		{
			scanf("\n%s", str);
			for(j = 0; j < M; j++)
			{
				if(str[j] == '*')
				{
					if(i > 0) ++mat[i-1][j];	//above in same column
					if(i < N-1) ++mat[i+1][j];	//below in same column
					if(i > 0 && j > 0)++mat[i-1][j-1];	//above and left
					if(i > 0 && j < M-1) ++mat[i-1][j+1];	//above and right
					if(i < N-1 && j > 0) ++mat[i+1][j-1];	//below and left
					if(i < N-1 && j < M-1) ++mat[i+1][j+1];	//below and right
					if(j > 0) ++mat[i][j-1];	//in same row and left
					if(j < M-1) ++mat[i][j+1];	//in same row and right
					mat[i][j] = -100;
				}
			}
		}
		printf("Field #%d:\n", field);
		for(i = 0; i < N; i++)
		{
			for(j = 0; j < M; j++)
				if(mat[i][j] < 0) printf("*");
				else printf("%d", mat[i][j]);
			printf("\n");
		}
		++field;
	}
//	fclose(stdin);
	return 0;
}
